title: Altcoin Market Faces $59 Billion Token Unlock Crisis
summary: Altcoins are experiencing severe underperformance with $59 billion in token unlocks creating massive selling pressure, while retail interest and trading volumes have collapsed. The report highlights a successful long Bitcoin/short altcoin strategy that has generated approximately 37% outperformance year-to-date, with Bitcoin up 17% while Solana and Ethereum are down 20% and 22% respectively.
